## Visit Us

The CaSE Lab is located in the former Cleveland Hearing and Speech Center at 11635 Euclid Ave on the campus of Case Western Reserve University. Parking passes are provided to participants at your scheduled visit.

> **Street Address:** 11635 Euclid Ave, Cleveland, OH 44118
